en: Nowadays, there are still a few groups of people in different parts of the world who do not have permanent homes.
zh: 如今，在世界各地仍然有一些群体没有固定的住所。

en: Today, paper is used in quantity every day.

en: Nowadays there is a close relationship between foreign relations and domestic affairs.
zh: 现在，外交和内政之间存在着密切的关系。

en: Today you can't be content with just earning a living.
zh: 今天，你不能仅仅满足于谋生。

en: It is not easy to be an umpire today.

en: Nowadays the young take no care of the old.
zh: 现在，年轻人不照顾老人。

en: Cars are now available in a wide range of prices.
zh: 现在汽车的价格范围很广。

en: Today, we can tell how the weather will be with a high degree of accuracy.
zh: 今天，我们可以高度准确地预测天气。

en: Nowadays freedom of speech is taken as a matter of course.
zh: 现在，言论自由被认为是理所当然的。

en: Nowadays, almost every home has one or two televisions.
zh: 现在，几乎每个家庭都有一到两台电视机。

en: Less students study German today than formerly.
zh: 今天学习德语的学生比以前少了。

en: Today no one can imagine a life without television.
zh: 今天，没有人能想象没有电视的生活。

en: It is an advantage today to have a knowledge of computers.
zh: 今天，具备计算机知识是一种优势。

en: Nowadays few people can afford to employ a maid.
zh: 现在，很少有人能负担得起雇用女佣。

en: Nowadays there are railways all over England.

en: Nowadays many people live to be over seventy years old.
zh: 现在，许多人活到七十多岁。

en: Today we have more than three times as many vehicles as on the roads in 1950.
zh: 今天，我们道路上的车辆数量是1950年的三倍多。

en: Today only 10 percent is covered.

en: Today she can do many things humans can do with language.

en: Nowadays, commuters take traffic jams for granted.

en: Today, through radio and television, mass advertising can reach millions of people at a time with its messages.
zh: 今天，通过广播和电视，大众广告可以一次性向数百万人传递信息。

en: More and more women have their own careers and are economically independent of their husbands.
zh: 越来越多的女性拥有自己的事业，并在经济上独立于丈夫。

en: Today, to send a telegram in the States to anywhere in the world, all you have to do is to give the message over the telephone.

zh: 到目前为止，我们学了多少谚语？

en: Never have I seen such a beautiful scene.
zh: 我从未见过如此美丽的景色。

en: Never have I heard such beautiful music.
zh: 我从未听过如此美妙的音乐。

en: Have you ever seen a lion?
zh: 你见过狮子吗？

en: No one has ever been able to solve this problem.
zh: 从来没有人能够解决这个问题。

en: Have you ever seen a wolf?
zh: 你见过狼吗？

en: Where've you been keeping yourself?
zh: 你一直躲在哪里？

en: Where have you been up to now?
zh: 你最近在忙些什么？

en: Up to now, only five guests have arrived.
zh: 到目前为止，只有五位客人到了。

en: I never have had occasion to use it.
zh: 我从来没有机会使用它。

en: No one has succeeded in solving the mystery.
zh: 没有人成功解开这个谜团。

en: Where have you been all this time?
zh: 这段时间你都去哪儿了？

en: What have you been doing upstairs all this time?
zh: 你一直在楼上做什么呢？

en: I was never so humiliated in my life.
zh: 我这辈子都没这么丢脸过。

en: I've never been so humiliated in my life.
zh: 我这辈子都没这么丢脸过。

en: I have been reading this book.
zh: 我一直在读这本书。

en: The football game is now in action.
zh: 足球比赛现在正在进行中。

en: It is ten degrees below zero now.
zh: 现在是零下十度。

en: We are good friends now, but we didn't like each other at first.
zh: 我们现在是好朋友，但起初我们并不喜欢对方。

en: We're good friends now, but we didn't like each other at first.
zh: 我们现在是好朋友，但起初我们并不喜欢对方。

en: Are you busy now?
zh: 你现在忙吗？

en: He said that he was busy then, but that he would be free the next day.
zh: 他说他当时很忙，但第二天就有空了。

en: Though he is busy but tommorrow may be free.
zh: 虽然他现在很忙，但明天可能有空。

en: I am unwilling to study now.
zh: 我现在不想学习。

en: Isn't this the wrong time to visit him?
zh: 现在去拜访他是不是不太合适？

en: Now they like cars of small or middle size.
zh: 现在他们喜欢中小型汽车。

en: Sales are down now.
zh: 现在销量下降了。

en: I have a lot of bad teeth.
zh: 我有很多坏牙。

en: I have a lot of cavities now.
zh: 我现在有很多蛀牙。

en: It's a do-or-die situation.
zh: 这是生死攸关的时刻。

en: I don't feel like doing my math homework now.
zh: 我现在不想做我的数学作业。

en: There are a lot of new buildings here now.
zh: 现在这里有很多新建筑。

en: We should not be rash now; we should wait for a good chance.
zh: 我们现在不应该轻举妄动，应该等待一个好机会。

en: Matsutake mushrooms are in season now so they are cheap.
zh: 现在是松茸的季节，所以很便宜。

en: Business is brisk now and we are up to the elbows in orders.
zh: 现在生意兴隆，我们忙得不可开交。

en: It is mid-autumn now.
zh: 现在是仲秋时节。

en: It is not too much to say that this is the age of cars.
zh: 现在说是汽车时代也不为过。

en: Matters are different now.
zh: 现在情况不同了。

en: Now is the time when we need him most.
zh: 现在是我们最需要他的时候。

en: The mayor is not available now.
zh: 市长现在没空。

en: The mayor isn't available now.
zh: 市长现在没空。

en: I'm at work now, so I'll call you later.
zh: 我现在在工作，所以晚点再给你打电话。

en: I don't want to resign my job at present.
zh: 我目前不想辞职。

en: I don't feel like taking a walk now.
zh: 我现在不想去散步。

en: I don't want to take a walk now.
zh: 我现在不想去散步。

en: I'm short of cash at the moment.
zh: 我现在手头有点紧。

en: It is not too much to say that this is the atomic age.
zh: 现在说是原子时代也不为过。

en: I'm off duty now.
zh: 我现在下班了。

en: Don't go out now. We're about to have lunch.
zh: 现在别出去。我们马上就要吃午饭了。

en: At present, going abroad is no longer the adventure it used to be.
zh: 目前，出国已经不像过去那样是冒险了。

en: "What time is it now?" "It's 3:30."
zh: “现在几点了？”“三点半。”

en: What's on the air now?
zh: 现在正在播放什么节目？

en: I don't have anything to do now.
zh: 我现在没事做。

en: It's a bearish market now.
zh: 现在是熊市。

en: Now the mountain is hidden by the clouds.
zh: 现在山被云遮住了。

en: There are a few drops of rain now.
zh: 现在下着几滴雨。

en: I really need a drink now.
zh: 我现在真想喝一杯。

en: It's the hottest season of the year now.
zh: 现在是一年中最热的季节。

en: Well, at this point, it's standing room only.
zh: 嗯，现在已经是站票了。

en: You should go back to bed now.
zh: 你现在应该回去睡觉了。

en: I'm not sure right now.
zh: 我现在不太确定。

en: It's very cold now.
zh: 现在很冷。

en: We're a bit busy at the moment. Can you hang on a minute?
zh: 我们现在有点忙。你能稍等一下吗？

en: I'm not in the least bit happy now.
zh: 我现在一点都不高兴。

en: I'm not at all happy now.
zh: 我现在一点都不高兴。

en: We don't have time to finish checking the figures now, but we can go over them after lunch.
zh: 我们现在没时间完成数字的核对，但我们可以在午饭后检查。

en: He'll become a good husband.
zh: 他会成为一个好丈夫。

en: I take care of the potatoes now.
zh: 我现在照料土豆。

en: I have nothing particular to do now.
zh: 我现在没有什么特别的事情要做。

en: There is much more water in this lake now than in the past.
zh: 现在这个湖里的水比过去多得多。

en: Oysters are in season now.
zh: 现在是吃牡蛎的季节。

en: I don't feel much like talking right now.
zh: 我现在不太想说话。

en: I don't have much time now.
zh: 我现在没有太多时间。

en: It's three o'clock now; I'll come again in an hour.
zh: 现在三点了；我一个小时后再来。

en: Now ten dollars buys less than five dollars did three years ago.
zh: 现在十美元的购买力不如三年前的五美元。

en: All I can think about is next month's vacation. I haven't been on one in so long.
zh: 我满脑子想的都是下个月的假期。我已经很久没休假了。

en: This is an age when honesty does not pay.
zh: 这是一个诚实没有好报的时代。

en: Why, I've let him win just to please him!
zh: 哎呀，我让他赢只是为了让他高兴！

en: In the current slump, economic growth has fallen to zero percent.
zh: 在目前的经济衰退中，经济增长已经降至零。

en: She is not what she used to be ten years ago.
zh: 她和十年前不一样了。

en: He is quite different from what he was ten years ago.
zh: 他和十年前完全不同了。

en: We aren't instilling enough of a volunteer spirit in our young people these days.
zh: 这些天我们没有在年轻人身上灌输足够的志愿精神。

en: Did you see that couple in matching outfits just now? How tasteless!
zh: 你刚才看到那对穿着情侣装的夫妇了吗？真没品味！

en: In getting her present job, she made capital of her father's connections.
zh: 她在得到现在这份工作时，利用了她父亲的关系。

en: She capitalised on her father's connections in getting her present job.
zh: 她在得到现在这份工作时，利用了她父亲的关系。

en: The present housing policy is likely to come up against considerable opposition.
zh: 目前的住房政策可能会遇到相当大的阻力。
